quotes.quote: Guidance requires action, but it does not guarantee safety.

Wise guidance never violates people's free will. A superior who demands obedience of his subordinates should show respect for their capacity to understand, and also for their innate right to their own free will.
Every time you don't follow your inner guidance, you feel a loss of energy, loss of power, a sense of spiritual deadness.
Let us guide our students over the road of discipline from materials, through function, to creative work.
You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.
If you allow yourself to expect guidance, guidance will show up.
There is a deep need in the world just now for guidance almost any sort of spiritual guidance.
People seek guidance of him who is master of himself.
The most perfect guide is nature. Continue without fail to draw something every day.

Do not assume that divine guidance flows only when you are in need of help. Guidance continues to flow whether or not you have problems. It transcends problems, heartbreaks, and traumas, flowing through dreams and illuminations. Whether guidance comes during times of tranquility or trauma, however, it is up to you to have the courage to acknowledge it.
Surely there is a time to submit to guidance and a time to take one's own way at all hazards.
If you follow the voice inside you, it does give you guidance.
Children require guidance and sympathy far more than instruction.
Your automatic guidance system cannot guide you when you're standing still.
Guidance is everything, you have to accept that somebody is their own person, an individual.
Nothing is impossible when we follow our inner guidance, even when its direction may threaten us by reversing our usual logic.
No man is great enough or wise enough for any of us to surrender our destiny to. The only way in which anyone can lead us is to restore to us the belief in our own guidance.
Unless virtue guides us, our choice must be wrong.
True guidance is like a small torch in a dark forest.It doesn't show everything once.But gives enough light for the next step to be safe.
A soul with purpose found is the light by which the world is guided.
We are blessed with guidance and it is within our power to find ways to both express and listen to this wisdom. The choice is ours.
All you need to do to receive guidance is to ask for it and then listen.
Guidance happens when we create the space in our minds to allow our angels to speak up. Set your ego aside and listen!

People want guidance, not rhetoric. They need to know what the plan of action is, and how it will be implemented. They want to be given responsibility to help solve the problem and authority to act on it.
Guidance is not attained except with knowledge and correct direction is not attained except with patience.
We have all a better guide in ourselves, if we would attend to it, than any other person can be.
We must be guided by faith. If we are guided by fear we lock ourselves and our expansion.
The simplest kind of guidance critique comes every day, and many times a day in the form of discomfort.
We may give advice, but we cannot give conduct.
It's advice, not a commandment. Don't swallow it whole until you're absolutely sure you've been given good, healthy advice.
Men have no better guidance than examples and facts proved by experience.
Give people enough guidance to make the decisions you want them to make. Don't tell them what to do, but encourage them to do what is best.
There is guidance for each of us, and by lowly listening we shall hear the right word.
Rules are for the obedience of fools and the guidance of wise men.
